job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Web Developer/Senior App Developer/Web Developer/App Developer (at the rank of IT Manager/IT Officer)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Web Developer/Senior App Developer/Web Developer/App Developer (at the rank of IT Manager/IT Officer)

* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on web and app development with AI integration, but lacks specific details on core AI engineering tasks like model development, fine-tuning, or deep generative model work. It emphasizes collaboration, deployment, and maintenance of AI-centric solutions within web/mobile applications, which could fall under traditional software development roles that leverage AI tools rather than specializing in AI model creation or advanced generative AI engineering. The title 'Senior Web Developer/Senior App Developer' further reinforces this focus. The role appears to be more about integrating AI into existing application development paradigms rather than being a dedicated AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools' directly relates to building software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance' and 'Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments' describe operational aspects of maintaining deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance' and 'Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments' describe operational aspects of maintaining deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions' indicates understanding and aligning technical solutions with broader project goals and working with different teams.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly data engineering, the phrase 'deploy AI-centric solutions' implies handling the infrastructure and pipelines needed for AI, which can overlap with data engineering principles.
The phrase 'AI-centric solutions' suggests some involvement with AI models, though the depth is not specified.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies
ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions
